additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Noodles (63%) (wheat flour^, wheat gluten), salt, sugar, mineral salt (potassium chloride), yeast extract, flavour enhancers (621, 635), maltodextrin, vegetable oil, natural chicken flavours, chicken powder (0.5%), onion powder, natural colour (turmeric), parsley, burnt sugar, spices (celery seed, pepper), food acid (lactic), sage extract. ^From sustainably grown Australian wheat.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Sesame, May Be Present Peanuts, May Be Present Fish, Contains Wheat, May Be Present Crustacea, May Be Present Egg, May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Lupin, May Be Present Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Great Taste is in our Nature. At Continental we partner with our Australian Farmers to grow all of the wheat used in the flour for our noodles sustainably growing our sustainable wheat in a way which minimises water and fertiliser use, protecting the biodiversity of the land and reducing energy consumption and waste. It's not only good For the planet but tastes great!
